body.p: The description of William Gardner Capps he is about 17 years of age weighs about 140 or 50 lbs he is lite complected lite hair very little if any beard. blue eyed. he is about 5 feet 10 inches high. The said Capps is supposed to have gone to N. C.
B K Bothurum J R C

To his Excellency
B. Magoffin governor of the
Commonwealth of Ky
William gardner Capps having murdered Jessee Burton in the county of Rockcastle state of Ky and having fled from justice This is to petition your Excellency to offer a reward for his apprehension
B. K. Bothurum J R C
